info.name: Google Array
info.description: This is based off Google Variety but with my own twists. CLICK CUSTOMIZE SETTINGS
info.additionalInfo: V1.2 (May 15th, 2018): ► Fixed Right search panel. ► Allowed users to input their own keywords for the background image. └ If left blank it will just use whatever image is featured for daily or weekly. ► Allowed users to turn off Search page banner and footer fade effects. ► Home and Search page search bars are now the same. V1.1 (May 12th, 2018): ► Fixed areas that would overlap. ► Changed font to Roboto. ► Minor tweaks to elements to fit the style better. V1.0 (May 8th, 2018): ► First release.

options.label: Yes
